turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello John, I would like to ask you to buy me a cup of coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where should I buy the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Peet's shall I go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Peet's in Alameda.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of coffee do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cafe au Lait.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk do you want in your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you sure? You usually get it with non-fat milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want something with more flavor and healthy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about soy milk or almond milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which one has more calories?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Both have 40 calories.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which one has more sodium?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Soy has more - 115 mg instead of 100 mg.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have hypertension, so I would prefer the almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very good. I will get that right away.
